name: Fusilier Company
description:
Fusilier Company is a simple multiplayer game: it's a duel between two companies of fusiliers in the Napoleonic era.

You are the captain of the company and your task is to tell the fusilier when to aim and when to shoot. You can choose between 3 type of volley fire.

If you give your soldier the order to shoot while they are reloading they will loose morale.

Every single soldier is simulated independently and has is own morale and hitpoints.
